Description.message: It is intended to help you extract the color palette of any website. You can also check the usage rate of the extracted colors.

Error_access_chrome_pages.message: Extensions cannot run in local chrome pages for security reasons

Error_access_chrome_web_store.message: Extensions cannot run in the chrome web store for security reasons

Error_access_reload.message: Please refresh the screen of the website page that was open when you added or updated this extension
